title.rendered: Medusa Equip Supply Partnership with Italcontrol S.R.L

content.rendered:
Medusa Equip and Italcontrol have agreed on a supply partnership which will position Medusa Equip as the distributor of Italcontrol products in the UK. In addition, the alliance will see Hydraton control and power systems being marketed worldwide in conjunction with Italcontrol work-holding and clamping structures.

Italcontrol has an excellent capability in such builds, in particular for large or complex arrangements. These “hybrid” systems will be co-branded in order to leverage the reputation of both parties for providing exceptional quality and service.

In its 24 year history, Italcontrol has been hugely successful in producing competitively priced, large complex rig designs supported by a supply chain located within a 5-mile radius of their manufacturing site in Marnate, Northern Italy. The supply Partnership will enable the parties to reach a broader and more diverse market and offer a far greater range of equipment, including equipment for cryogenic and actuator testing.

Formed more than 35 years ago, Medusa Equip is widely recognised for creating innovative, high-quality products and solutions that provide performance assurance. The company supplies the oil and gas, petrochemical, power generation, aerospace, automotive and defence industries.

In the picture from left to right: Kevin Brooks, Medusa Equip Commercial Manager; Fabio Castiglioni, Italcontrol CEO; Carlo Buzio, Italcontrol Sales Manager.
